amendment.description: To make the waiver authority of the President contingent upon a determination that India is fully and actively participating in United States and international efforts to dissuade, sanction, and contain Iran for its nuclear program consistent with United Nations Security Council resolutions.

action.text: Amendment SA 5173 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Harkin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5173 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
